data.lyric:
[ti:The Man Who Loves You The Most]
[ar:Zac Brown Band]
[al:The Man Who Loves You The Most]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]The Man Who Loves You The Most - Zac Brown Band
[00:06.77]Lyrics by：Zac Brown/Ben Simonetti/Adam James
[00:13.55]Most nights I try to pack
[00:16.37]Got you climbing on my back
[00:18.97]Saying Daddy when am I gonna see you again
[00:24.81]You know I gotta go out on the road
[00:28.97]And get on with the show
[00:30.79]So most nights your mama's gonna tuck you in
[00:37.09]When you're missing me look at the stars up there
[00:43.21]I'll be wishing on the same ones and sing this fathers prayer
[00:50.55]I hope you see the seven wonders
[00:53.59]I hope you sail the seven seas
[00:56.45]I hope you let the whole world in your heart
[01:00.09]But you still got room for me
[01:02.65]I hope you find a guy that treats you right
[01:05.86]On your wedding night I'll raise a toast
[01:08.64]Hope he understands
[01:11.36]I'll always be the man that loves you the most
[01:27.80]Summer's gone and school is back
[01:30.74]It's my turn to help you pack
[01:33.43]I'll keep your room exactly how it is
[01:39.14]I know you gotta go out on your own
[01:42.91]I'm so proud of you you know
[01:45.38]You're the best thing that this old man ever did
[01:51.48]When I'm missing you and all the stars come out
[01:57.71]I sing this prayer when the quiet gets too loud
[02:04.99]I hope you see the seven wonders
[02:08.04]I hope you sail the seven seas
[02:10.98]I hope you let the whole world in your heart
[02:14.42]But you still got room for me
[02:17.07]I hope you find a guy that treats you right
[02:20.22]On your wedding night I'll raise a toast
[02:23.05]Hope he understands
[02:25.81]I'll always be the man who loves you the most
[02:32.55]Trust your gut hold your own
[02:35.44]But allow for doubtin' too
[02:39.02]Forgive the wrongs and love yourself
[02:41.75]That's the hardest thing to do
[02:44.64]If your back's against the wall baby
[02:48.00]Come on home
[02:52.46]I'm always here for you
[02:58.18]And when you've seen the seven wonders
[03:01.10]When you've sailed the seven seas
[03:04.38]When you change the whole world with your heart
[03:07.61]I hope you think of me
[03:10.42]When I go to sing my final song
[03:13.41]Hope you celebrate and raise a toast
[03:16.33]If you cry they'll understand
[03:22.71]For the man who loved you the most
data.trans:
[ti:The Man Who Loves You The Most]
[ar:Zac Brown Band]
[al:The Man Who Loves You The Most]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:06.77]//
[00:13.55]大多数晚上我都在收拾行李
[00:16.37]你爬上我的背
[00:18.97]说爸爸我什么时候能再见到你呀
[00:24.81]你知道我得出门了
[00:28.97]继续去表演
[00:30.79]所以大多数晚上你妈妈会给你掖好被子
[00:37.09]当你想我的时候 就看看天上的星星
[00:43.21]我会对着同一颗许愿 唱出父亲的祈祷
[00:50.55]我希望你能看到七大奇迹
[00:53.59]我希望你能穿越七大洋
[00:56.45]我希望你让整个世界都在你的心里
[01:00.09]但你仍为我留有空间
[01:02.65]我希望你能找到一个对你好的人
[01:05.86]在你新婚之夜 我要举杯祝酒
[01:08.64]希望他能理解
[01:11.36]我永远是最爱你的人
[01:27.80]暑假过去 即将开学
[01:30.74]轮到我帮你打包行李了
[01:33.43]我会让你的房间保持原样
[01:39.14]我知道你不得不只身出门在外
[01:42.91]我真为你骄傲 你知道的
[01:45.38]有你是我这老头儿这辈子最大的福分
[01:51.48]当我想你的时候 所有的星星都探出头
[01:57.71]当四周只有沉寂 我会唱出这祈祷
[02:04.99]我希望你能看到七大奇迹
[02:08.04]我希望你能穿越七大洋
[02:10.98]我希望你让整个世界都在你的心里
[02:14.42]但你仍为我留有空间
[02:17.07]我希望你能找到一个对你好的人
[02:20.22]在你新婚之夜 我要举杯祝酒
[02:23.05]希望他能理解
[02:25.81]我永远是最爱你的人
[02:32.55]相信自己的直觉 抓住自己的机会
[02:35.44]但是也允许怀疑
[02:39.02]原谅错误 爱惜你自己
[02:41.75]这是最难做到的
[02:44.64]如果你无路可退 宝贝
[02:48.00]回家来吧
[02:52.46]我永远会在这里等你
[02:58.18]当你看到了七大奇迹
[03:01.10]当你穿越了七大洋
[03:04.38]当你用你的心改变了整个世界
[03:07.61]我希望你会想到我
[03:10.42]当我唱响我人生的最后一首歌
[03:13.41]希望你能举杯庆祝
[03:16.33]如果你痛哭一场 人们也会理解的
[03:22.71]毕竟是为了最爱你的人
